title:
Experimentation, deployment and monitoring Machine Learning models:
  Approaches for applying MLOps
abstract:
In recent years, Data Science has become increasingly relevant as a support
tool for industry, significantly enhancing decision-making in a way never seen
before. In this context, the MLOps discipline emerges as a solution to automate
the life cycle of Machine Learning models, ranging from experimentation to
monitoring in productive environments. Research results shows MLOps is a
constantly evolving discipline, with challenges and solutions for integrating
development and production environments, publishing models in production
environments, and monitoring models throughout the end to end development
lifecycle. This paper contributes to the understanding of MLOps techniques and
their most diverse applications.
